Articles.Content:
Two common trucks with trailers. a flat bed and a container one. now you can drive them in ksp, with moving trailers.

just press 1 at launch pad and drive around. 1 is to make the trailer act like a trailer and the front wheels turn right.

the flatbed truck has a part count of 130 and the container truck has a part count of 125.

Download

Spaceport

Javascript is disabled. View full album

if you like these give a big thanks to Giggleplex777 for i got the hinges from his helicopter design.
If you attach the structural pylons on an I-beam,it will be more flexible.
like the i beam instead of the radial engine mount thing or in replace of the decouplers
Replace the cubic struts with an I beam.
